articles.author: Rob Picheta, Niamh Kennedy, Ed Upright, CNN
articles.title: UK police to issue 20 fines over Downing Street lockdown parties - CNN
articles.description: British police will issue 20 fines as part of their investigation into illegal parties held in the heart of Boris Johnson's government, which took place while the rest of the country was living under strict pandemic lockdowns and sparked outrage in the UK.

articles.title: Apex Legends Warriors event includes upgrades for PS5 and Xbox Series X and S - The Verge
articles.description: EA and Respawn Entertainment are launching new features for the PlayStation 5 and Xbox Series X / S versions of Apex Legends on March 29th. They’ll add 4K and HDR output now, with 120Hz support coming soon.
articles.content: 120Hz and adaptive trigger support on the PS5 will take a little longer.
